Today in County Clare, surf is small and not producing, with 2 ft @11s WNW and light 3 mph NE winds. Tomorrow drops further to 1 ft @9s WNW with moderate 10 mph NE winds, keeping it flat and unworkable. The day after continues the trend with 1 ft @7s NW and fresh 19 mph NE winds, adding to the chop. Best: today.
